title: Mayor accused of blackmailing hoteliers
content: News Source: BBC Sandeshaya – By Saroj Pathirana Hoteliers in a popular tourist destination in Sri Lanka have accused a local politician of blackmailing them and demanding ransom from hotels at the peak of a tourism season.
